title: Marvel Search
description: This app was created using: html5, css3, Jquery, javascript, bootstrap, and the Marvel API. You can either search a character or comicbook and either one takes what you searched and queries it through the Marvel API, which in turn generates character info on a card in the response.

title: Personality Test
description: This app was created using: handlebars, css3, Jquery, nodejs, express, javascript, bootstrap, mySQL, and Sequelize. Click the begin button, take the test, fill out form at bottom to sign in, and then view youre results.

title: Topic Search
description: This app was created using: html5, css3, Jquery, javascript, bootstrap and the Google News, Billboard, and Youtube API's. On the top of the oage you can search any topic whether it be a person, world event, a song etc. and you'll be presented with the first 5 results from the youtube and google api's.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: This app was created using: html5, css3, Jquery, javascript, bootstrap and the openweathermap API. First, youll be asked to search a city and once you enter it and press search, the ajax will run with your query and you'll be displayed with the current day's forecasr as well as the 5 day forecast. this is using the current day, uv index, and 5day API's from openweathermap

title: Employee Directory
description: This app was created using: css3, javascript, bootstrap and React. This app is basically a list of all office characters and you can search the list, or filter by department. You can even sort by Alphabetical order.

title: Password Generator
description: This app was created using: html5, css3, javascript and bootstrap. When you click 'Generate' you are prompted with alerts asking which specific characters you'd like in your password. Once thats done your password will be displayed free for you to use.
